title: Shark ransomware
extract: Ransomware is a type of malicious software from cryptovirology that threatens to publish the victim's data or perpetually block access to it unless a ransom is paid. ... There have been 181.5 million ransomware attacks in the first six months of 2018.
extract_html: Ransomware is a type of malicious software from cryptovirology that threatens to publish the victim's data or perpetually block access to it unless a ransom is paid. ... There have been 181.5 million ransomware attacks in the first six months of 2018.
